text:
Message 3146 of 4024
Ok... before I say something stupid, I interpreted your ask of me is that we slice the "Moyer" account in half. And we each get 50%. I assume that it
would be used for discretionary spending. The net being is we don't want to pay for each other's Botox or massages.  We would need to agree on that
definition, but we could do that.
So, if that is the case and the lawyers are interpreting your ask correctly, I will proceed. If that is not the case and the lawyer <-> lawyer
communications are not aligned, I am happy to just wait till they figure it out, or you can tell me. But whatever it is, I don't care to argue or fight. I'm
trying to help you so it's not worth the argument.
Sent:06/12/2024 at 07:01 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/13/2024 at 07:50 AM)
Subject:Re: mo monies... an idea
Message 3147 of 4024
I’m watching GAL stuff. It’s very scary. He has full legal rights to ALL our texts and emails. Did you guys talk about that at all? We have so many
naughty pics. I know we won’t ever be together again but the idea of another man seeing your pics and our dirty conversations makes me sick, sad and
queasy.
Do you know if there is any way to be able to not turn over the intimate stuff. I can’t stop crying right now over the idea of someone else seeing you
nude that way. It’s not their business. It has nothing to do with this. Plus I sent a bunch of b*ner pics. But that’s his problem. But in the white
panties!!! It’s too much...
Sent:06/12/2024 at 08:48 PM
From:Robert Moyer
